snippet.title: Dustforce Official Trailer - Available on Steam
snippet.description:
Dustforce is available now on Steam! Click here to get the game: http://store.steampowered.com/app/65300/

Clean up the world with style!  As an acrobatic janitor, you are an adept force against dust and disorder.  Leap and dash off walls and ceilings, and deftly traverse 50 precarious environments varying in difficulty.  Cleanse each level swiftly and thoroughly to achieve mastery in this 2D sweep-'em-up platformer.

The game is currently available on Steam for $9.99.
The soundtrack is available for $3.99 here: http://lifeformed.bandcamp.com/album/fastfall
